   19: %%
   20: -module(erl_lint_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: %%-define(debug, true).
   23: 
   24: -ifdef(debug).
   25: -define(line, put(line, ?LINE), ).
   26: -define(config(X,Y), foo).
   27: -define(datadir, "erl_lint_SUITE_data").
   28: -define(privdir, "erl_lint_SUITE_priv").
   29: -define(t, test_server).
   30: -else.
   31: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   32: -define(datadir, proplists:get_value(data_dir, Conf)).
   33: -define(privdir, proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Conf)).
   34: -endif.
   35: 
   36: -export([all/0, suite/0, groups/0]).
   37: 
   38: -export([singleton_type_var_errors/1,
   39:          unused_vars_warn_basic/1,
   40:          unused_vars_warn_lc/1,
   41:          unused_vars_warn_rec/1,
   42:          unused_vars_warn_fun/1,
   43:          unused_vars_OTP_4858/1,
   44:          unused_unsafe_vars_warn/1,
   45:          export_vars_warn/1,
   46:          shadow_vars/1,
   47:          unused_import/1,
   48:          unused_function/1,
   49:          unsafe_vars/1,unsafe_vars2/1,
   50:          unsafe_vars_try/1,
   51:          unsized_binary_in_bin_gen_pattern/1,
   52:          guard/1, otp_4886/1, otp_4988/1, otp_5091/1, otp_5276/1, otp_5338/1,
   53:          otp_5362/1, otp_5371/1, otp_7227/1, binary_aliases/1,
   54:          otp_5494/1, otp_5644/1, otp_5878/1,
   55:          otp_5917/1, otp_6585/1, otp_6885/1, otp_10436/1, otp_11254/1,
   56:          otp_11772/1, otp_11771/1, otp_11872/1,
   57:          export_all/1,
   58:          bif_clash/1,
   59:          behaviour_basic/1, behaviour_multiple/1, otp_11861/1,
   60:          otp_7550/1,
   61:          otp_8051/1,
   62:          format_warn/1,
   63:          on_load_successful/1, on_load_failing/1,
   64:          too_many_arguments/1,
   65:          basic_errors/1,bin_syntax_errors/1,
   66:          predef/1,
   67:          maps/1,maps_type/1,maps_parallel_match/1,
   68:          otp_11851/1,otp_11879/1,otp_13230/1,
   69:          record_errors/1, otp_11879_cont/1,
   70:          non_latin1_module/1, illegal_module_name/1, otp_14323/1,
   71:          stacktrace_syntax/1,
   72:          otp_14285/1, otp_14378/1,
   73:          external_funs/1,otp_15456/1,otp_15563/1,
   74:          unused_type/1,binary_types/1,removed/1, otp_16516/1,
   75:          inline_nifs/1,
   76:          undefined_nifs/1,
   77:          no_load_nif/1,
   78:          warn_missing_spec/1,
   79:          otp_16824/1,
   80:          underscore_match/1,
   81:          unused_record/1,
   82:          unused_type2/1,
   83:          eep49/1,
   84:          redefined_builtin_type/1,
   85:          tilde_k/1,
   86:          match_float_zero/1,
   87:          undefined_module/1]).
   88: 
   89: suite() ->
   90:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   91:      {timetrap,{minutes,1}}].
   92: 
   93: all() -> 
   94:     [{group, unused_vars_warn}, export_vars_warn,
   95:      shadow_vars, unused_import, unused_function,
   96:      unsafe_vars, unsafe_vars2, unsafe_vars_try, guard,
   97:      unsized_binary_in_bin_gen_pattern,
   98:      otp_4886, otp_4988, otp_5091, otp_5276, otp_5338,
   99:      otp_5362, otp_5371, otp_7227, binary_aliases, otp_5494, otp_5644,
  100:      otp_5878, otp_5917, otp_6585, otp_6885, otp_10436, otp_11254,
  101:      otp_11772, otp_11771, otp_11872, export_all,
  102:      bif_clash, behaviour_basic, behaviour_multiple, otp_11861,
  103:      otp_7550, otp_8051, format_warn, {group, on_load},
  104:      too_many_arguments, basic_errors, bin_syntax_errors, predef,
  105:      maps, maps_type, maps_parallel_match,
  106:      otp_11851, otp_11879, otp_13230,
  107:      record_errors, otp_11879_cont,
  108:      non_latin1_module, illegal_module_name, otp_14323,
  109:      stacktrace_syntax, otp_14285, otp_14378, external_funs,
  110:      otp_15456, otp_15563, unused_type, binary_types, removed, otp_16516,
  111:      undefined_nifs,
  112:      no_load_nif,
  113:      inline_nifs, warn_missing_spec, otp_16824,
  114:      underscore_match, unused_record, unused_type2,
  115:      eep49,
  116:      redefined_builtin_type,
  117:      tilde_k,
  118:      singleton_type_var_errors,
  119:      match_float_zero,
  120:      undefined_module].
  121: 
  122: groups() -> 
  123:     [{unused_vars_warn, [],
  124:       [unused_vars_warn_basic, unused_vars_warn_lc,
  125:        unused_vars_warn_rec, unused_vars_warn_fun,
  126:        unused_vars_OTP_4858, unused_unsafe_vars_warn]},
  127:      {on_load, [], [on_load_successful, on_load_failing]}].
  128: 
  129: 
  130: %% Warnings for unused variables in some simple cases.
  131: unused_vars_warn_basic(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  132:     Ts = [{basic1,
  133:            <<"f(F) -> % F unused.
  134:                 ok.
  135: 
  136: f(F, F) ->
  137:     ok.
  138: 
  139: g(_X) ->
  140:     y.
  141: 
  142: h(P) ->
  143:     P.
  144: 
  145: x(N) ->
  146:     case a:b() of
  147: 	[N|Y] -> % Y unused.
  148: 	    ok
  149:     end.
  150: 
  151: y(N, L) ->
  152:     lists:map(fun(T) -> T*N end, L).
  153: 
  154: z(N, L) -> % N unused
  155:     lists:map(fun(N, T) -> T*N end, L).  % N shadowed.
  156: 
  157: 
  158: c(A) ->
  159:     case A of
  160: 	1 -> B = []; % B unused.
  161: 	2 -> B = []; % B unused.
  162: 	3 -> B = f, B
  163:     end.
  164: ">>,
  165: 	   [warn_unused_vars],
  166: {warnings,[{{1,23},erl_lint,{unused_var,'F'}},
  167: 	   {{15,5},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Y'}},
  168: 	   {{22,3},erl_lint,{unused_var,'N'}},
  169: 	   {{23,19},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'N','fun'}},
  170: 	   {{28,7},erl_lint,{unused_var,'B'}},
  171: 	   {{29,7},erl_lint,{unused_var,'B'}}]}},
  172:           {basic2,
  173:            <<"-record(r, {x,y}).
  174:               f({X,Y}) -> {Z=X,Z=Y};
  175:               f([H|T]) -> [Z=H|Z=T];
  176:               f(#r{x=X,y=Y}) -> #r{x=A=X,y=A=Y}.
  177:               g({M, F}) -> (Z=M):(Z=F)();
  178:               g({M, F, Arg}) -> (Z=M):F(Z=Arg).
  179:               h(X, Y) -> (Z=X) + (Z=Y).">>,
  180:            [warn_unused_vars], []},
  181:           {basic3,
  182:            <<"f(E) ->
  183:                   X = Y = E.">>,
  184:            [warn_unused_vars],
  185:            {warnings,[{{2,19},erl_lint,{unused_var,'X'}},
  186:                       {{2,23},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Y'}}]}}],
  187:     [] = run(Config, Ts),
  188:     ok.
  189: 
  190: %% Warnings for unused variables in list comprehensions.
  191: unused_vars_warn_lc(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  192:     Ts = [{lc1, 
  193:            <<"bin([X]) ->
  194:                   [A || <<A:X>> <- []]; % X used, not shadowed.
  195:               bin({X}) ->
  196:                   [X || <<X:X>> <- []]; % X used, and shadowed.
  197:               bin({X,Y,Z}) ->
  198:                   [{A,B} || <<A:X>> <- Z, <<B:Y>> <- Z];
  199:               bin([X,Y,Z]) -> % Y unused.
  200:                   [C || <<V:X>> <- Z, <<B:V>> <- Z, <<C:B>> <- Z].
  201:            ">>, 
  202:            [warn_unused_vars],
  203:            {warnings, [{{4,27},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'X',generate}},
  204:                        {{7,22},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Y'}}]}},
  205: 
  206:           {lc2,
  207:            <<"bin([X]) ->
  208:                   [A || <<A:X>> <- []]; % X used, not shadowed.
  209:               bin({X}) ->
  210:                   [X || <<X:X>> <- []]; % X used, and shadowed.
  211:               bin({X,Y,Z}) ->
  212:                   [{A,B} || <<A:X>> <- Z, <<B:Y>> <- Z];
  213:               bin([X,Y,Z]) -> % Y unused.
  214:                   [C || <<V:X>> <- Z, <<B:V>> <- Z, <<C:B>> <- Z].
  215:            ">>,
  216:            [warn_unused_vars],
  217:            {warnings,[{{4,27},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'X',generate}},
  218:                       {{7,22},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Y'}}]}},
  219: 
  220:           {lc3,
  221:            <<"a([A]) ->
  222:                   B = foo,
  223:                   [{C,B} || {C,_} <- A];
  224:               a({A}) ->
  225:                   B = foo,
  226:                   [C || {C,_} <- [B,A]];
  227:               a({A,A}) ->
  228:                   B = foo,
  229:                   [C || {C,_} <- B, B < A].
  230:            ">>,
  231:            [warn_unused_vars],
  232:            []},
  233: 
  234:           {lc4,
  235:            <<"b(A) ->
  236:                   B = foo, % B unused.
  237:                   [C || {C,_} <- A].
  238:            ">>,
  239:            [warn_unused_vars],
  240:            {warnings,[{{2,19},erl_lint,{unused_var,'B'}}]}},
  241: 
  242:           {lc5,
  243:            <<"c(A) ->
  244:                   B = foo,
  245:                   [C || {C,_} <- A],
  246:                   B.
  247:            ">>,
  248:            [warn_unused_vars],
  249:            []},
  250: 
  251:           {lc6,
  252:            <<"d(A) ->
  253:                   B = foo,
  254:                   [{A,B} || {Id,_} <- A]. % Id unused.
  255:            ">>,
  256:            [warn_unused_vars],
  257:            {warnings,[{{3,30},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Id'}}]}},
  258: 
  259:           {lc7,
  260:            <<"e(A) ->
  261:                   B = foo, % B unused.
  262:                   [B || B <- A]. % B shadowed.
  263:            ">>,
  264:            [warn_unused_vars],
  265:            {warnings,[{{2,19},erl_lint,{unused_var,'B'}},
  266:                       {{3,25},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'B',generate}}]}},
  267: 
  268:           {lc8,
  269:            <<"f(A) ->
  270:                   B = foo,
  271:                   [B || B <- A], % B shadowed.
  272:                   B.
  273:            ">>,
  274:            [warn_unused_vars],
  275:            {warnings,[{{3,25},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'B',generate}}]}},
  276: 
  277:           {lc9,
  278:            <<"g(A) ->
  279:                   B = foo, % B unused.
  280:                   [A || B <- A]. % B shadowed, B unused.
  281:            ">>,
  282:            [warn_unused_vars],
  283:            {warnings,[{{2,19},erl_lint,{unused_var,'B'}},
  284:                       {{3,25},erl_lint,{unused_var,'B'}},
  285:                       {{3,25},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'B',generate}}]}},
  286: 
  287:           {lc10,
  288:            <<"h(A) ->
  289:                   B = foo,
  290:                   [A || B <- A], % B shadowed, B unused.
  291:                   B.
  292:            ">>,
  293:            [warn_unused_vars],
  294:            {warnings,[{{3,25},erl_lint,{unused_var,'B'}},
  295:                       {{3,25},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'B',generate}}]}},
  296: 
  297:           {lc11,
  298:            <<"i(X) ->
  299:                   [Z || Z <- X, % Z unused.
  300:                         Z = X <- [foo]]. % X and Z shadowed. X unused!
  301:            ">>,
  302:            [warn_unused_vars],
  303:            {warnings,[{{2,25},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Z'}},
  304:                       {{3,25},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'Z',generate}},
  305:                       {{3,29},erl_lint,{unused_var,'X'}},
  306:                       {{3,29},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'X',generate}}]}},
  307: 
  308:           {lc12,
  309:            <<"j({X}) ->
  310:                   [Z || Z <- X, % Z unused.
  311:                         Z <- X = [[1,2,3]], % Z shadowed. Z unused.
  312:                         Z <- X, % Z shadowed. Z unused.
  313:                         Z <- X]; % Z shadowed.
  314:               j(X) ->
  315:                   [foo || X <- X, % X shadowed.
  316:                         X <-    % X shadowed. X unused.
  317:                              X =
  318:                                  Y = [[1,2,3]], % Y unused.
  319:                         X <- [], % X shadowed.
  320:                         X <- X]. % X shadowed. X unused.
  321:            ">>,
  322:            [warn_unused_vars],
  323:            {warnings,[{{2,25},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Z'}},
  324:                       {{3,25},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Z'}},
  325:                       {{3,25},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'Z',generate}},
  326:                       {{4,25},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Z'}},
  327:                       {{4,25},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'Z',generate}},
  328:                       {{5,25},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'Z',generate}},
  329:                       {{7,27},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'X',generate}},
  330:                       {{8,25},erl_lint,{unused_var,'X'}},
  331:                       {{8,25},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'X',generate}},
  332:                       {{10,34},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Y'}},
  333:                       {{11,25},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'X',generate}},
  334:                       {{12,25},erl_lint,{unused_var,'X'}},
  335:                       {{12,25},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'X',generate}}]}},
  336: 
  337:           {lc13,
  338:            <<"k(X) ->
  339:                   [Z || Z <- Y = X]; % Y unused.
  340:               k(X) ->
  341:                   [Z || Z <- X = Y = X]; % Y unused!
  342:               k(X) ->
  343:                   [Z || Z <- begin X = Y = X, Y end];
  344:               k(X) ->
  345:                   [{Y,W} || W <- Y = X]; % Y unbound
  346:               k(X) ->
  347:                   [Z || Z <- (Y = X), % Y unused.
  348:                        Y > X]; % Y unbound.
  349:               k(X) ->
  350:                   [Y || Y = X > 3, Z = X]; % Z unused.
  351:               k(X) ->
  352:                   [Z || Y = X > 3, Z = X]. % Y unused.
  353:            ">>,
  354:            [warn_unused_vars],
  355:            {error,[{{8,21},erl_lint,{unbound_var,'Y'}},
  356:                    {{11,24},erl_lint,{unbound_var,'Y'}}],
  357:                   [{{2,30},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Y'}},
  358:                    {{4,34},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Y'}},
  359:                    {{8,34},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Y'}},
  360:                    {{10,31},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Y'}},
  361:                    {{13,36},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Z'}},
  362:                    {{15,25},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Y'}}]}},
  363: 
  364:           {lc14,
  365:            <<"lc2() ->
  366:                   Z = [[1],[2],[3]], 
  367:                   [X || Z <- Z, % Z shadowed.
  368:                         X <- Z].
  369:            ">>,
  370:            [warn_unused_vars],
  371:            {warnings,[{{3,25},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'Z',generate}}]}},
  372: 
  373:           {lc15,
  374:            <<"lc3() ->
  375:                   Z = [1,2,3], 
  376:                   [X || X <- Z, 
  377:                         Z <- Z]. % Z shadowed. Z unused.
  378:            ">>,
  379:            [warn_unused_vars],
  380:            {warnings,[{{4,25},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Z'}},
  381:                       {{4,25},erl_lint,{shadowed_var,'Z',generate}}]}},
  382: 
  383:           {lc16,
  384:            <<"bin(Z) ->
  385:                   case bar of
  386:                       true ->
  387:                           U = 2;
  388:                       false ->
  389:                           true
  390:                   end,
  391:                   case bar of
  392:                       true ->
  393:                           X = 2;
  394:                       false ->
  395:                           X = 3
  396:                   end,
  397:                   case foo of
  398:                       true ->
  399:                           Y = 3; % Y unused.
  400:                       false ->
  401:                           4
  402:                   end,
  403:                   case foo of
  404:                       1 ->
  405:                           U; % U unsafe.
  406:                       2 ->
  407:                           [Z || <<U:X>> <- Z]; % (X exported.) U unused.
  408:                       3 ->
  409:                           [Z || <<U:X>> <- Z], % (X exported.) U unused.
  410:                           U % U unsafe.
  411:                   end.
  412:            ">>,
  413:            [warn_unused_vars],
  414:            {error,[{{22,27},erl_lint,{unsafe_var,'U',{'case',{2,19}}}},
  415:                    {{27,27},erl_lint,{unsafe_var,'U',{'case',{2,19}}}}],
  416:             [{{16,27},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Y'}},
  417:              {{24,35},erl_lint,{unused_var,'U'}},
  418:              {{26,35},erl_lint,{unused_var,'U'}}]}},
  419: 
  420:           {lc17,
  421:            <<"bin(Z) ->
  422:                   %% This used to pass erl_lint...
  423:                   case bar of
  424:                       true ->
  425:                           U = 2;
  426:                       false ->
  427:                           true
  428:                   end,
  429:                   case bar of
  430:                       true ->
  431:                           X = 2;
  432:                       false ->
  433:                           X = 3
  434:                   end,
  435:                   case foo of
  436:                       true ->
  437:                           Y = 3; % Y unused.
  438:                       false ->
  439:                           4
  440:                   end,
  441:                   [Z || <<U:X>> <- Z], % (X exported.) U unused.
  442:                   U. % U unsafe.
  443:            ">>,
  444:            [warn_unused_vars],
  445:            {error,[{{22,19},erl_lint,{unsafe_var,'U',{'case',{3,19}}}}],
  446:             [{{17,27},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Y'}},
  447:              {{21,27},erl_lint,{unused_var,'U'}}]}},
  448: 
  449:           {lc18,
  450:            <<"bin(Z) ->
  451:                   case bar of
  452:                       true ->
  453:                           U = 2;
  454:                       false ->
  455:                           true
  456:                   end,
  457:                   case bar of
  458:                       true ->
  459:                           X = 2;
  460:                       false ->
  461:                           X = 3
  462:                   end,
  463:                   case foo of
  464:                       true ->
  465:                           Y = 3;
  466:                       false ->
  467:                           4
  468:                   end,
  469:                   [B || <<U: % U unused
  470:                           U>> <- X, <<B:Y>> <- Z]. % U unsafe. Y unsafe. 
  471: 						% U shadowed. (X exported.)
  472:            ">>,
  473:            [warn_unused_vars],
  474:            {error,[{{21,27},erl_lint,{unsafe_var,'U',{'case',{2,19}}}},
  475:                    {{21,41},erl_lint,{unsafe_var,'Y',{'case',{14,19}}}}],
  476:             [{{20,27},erl_lint,{unused_var,'U'}}
  477:             ]}},
  478: 
  479:           {lc19,
  480:            <<"p({B,C}) ->
  481:                   <<A:B,A:C>> = <<17:32>>;
  482:               p(B) ->
  483:                   <<A:B>> = <<17:32>>. % A unused.
  484:            ">>,
  485:            [warn_unused_vars],
  486:            {warnings,[{{4,21},erl_lint,{unused_var,'A'}}]}},
  487: 
  488:           {lc20,
  489:            <<"c({I1,I2}) ->
  490:                   if
  491:                       <<I1:I2>> == <<>> ->
  492:                           foo
  493:                   end;
  494:               c([C1,C2]) -> % C1 unused.
  495:                   case foo of
  496:                       <<C2:C2,
  497:                         C3:C2>> -> % C3 unused.
  498:                           bar
  499:                   end.
  500: 
  501:            ">>,
  502:            [warn_unused_vars],
  503:            {warnings,[{{6,18},erl_lint,{unused_var,'C1'}},
  504:                       {{7,19},sys_core_fold,{nomatch,no_clause}},
  505:                       {{9,25},erl_lint,{unused_var,'C3'}}]}},
  506: 
  507:           {lc21,
  508:            <<"t() ->
  509:                   S = 8,
  510:                   case <<3:8>> of
  511:                       <<X:S>> ->
  512:                           X;
  513:                       <<S:X>> -> % X unbound
  514:                           foo
  515:                   end;
  516:               t() ->
  517:                   S = 8,
  518:                   case <<3:8>> of
  519:                       <<S:S>> ->
  520:                           S;
  521:                       <<Q:32>> -> % Q unused.
  522:                           foo
  523:                   end.
  524:            ">>,
  525:            [warn_unused_vars],
  526:            {error,[{{6,27},erl_lint,{unbound_var,'X'}}],
  527:                   [{{14,25},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Q'}}]}}
  528: 
  529:           ],
  530:     [] = run(Config, Ts),
  531:     ok.
  532: 
  533: 
  534: %% Warnings for unused variables in records.
  535: unused_vars_warn_rec(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  536:     Ts = [{rec1, % An example provided by Bjorn.
  537:            <<"-record(edge,
  538:                       {ltpr,
  539:                        ltsu,
  540:                        rtpr,
  541:                        rtsu
  542:                       }).
  543: 
  544:               f1(#edge{ltpr = A, ltsu = A}) ->
  545:                   true;
  546:               f1({Q, Q}) ->
  547:                   true.
  548: 
  549:               f2(Edge, Etab) ->
  550:                   case gb_trees:lookup(Edge, Etab) of
  551:                       {value,#edge{ltpr=Same,ltsu=Same}} -> ok;
  552:                       {value,_} -> error
  553:                   end.
  554: 
  555:               bar(Edge, Etab) ->
  556:                   case gb_trees:lookup(Edge, Etab) of
  557:                       {Same,Same} -> ok;
  558:                       {value,#edge{ltpr=Same}} -> ok; % Same unused.
  559:                       {value,_} -> error
  560:                   end.
  561:            ">>,
  562:            [warn_unused_vars],
  563:            {warnings,[{{22,41},erl_lint,{unused_var,'Same'}}]}},
  564:           {rec2,
  565:            <<"-record(r, {a,b}).
  566:               f(X, Y) -> #r{a=[K || K <- Y], b=[K || K <- Y]}.
  567:               g(X, Y) -> #r{a=lists:map(fun (K) -> K end, Y),
  568:                             b=lists:map(fun (K) -> K end, Y)}.
  569:               h(X, Y) -> #r{a=case Y of _ when is_list(Y) -> Y end,
  570:                             b=case Y of _ when is_list(Y) -> Y end}.
  571:               i(X, Y) -> #r{a=if is_list(Y) -> Y end, b=if is_list(Y) -> Y end}.
  572:              ">>,
  573:            [warn_unused_vars],
  574:            {warnings,[{{2,17},erl_lint,{unused_var,'X'}},
  575:                       {{3,17},erl_lint,{unused_var,'X'}},
  576:                       {{5,17},erl_lint,{unused_var,'X'}},
  577:                       {{7,17},erl_lint,{unused_var,'X'}}]}},
  578:           {rec3,
  579:            <<"-record(r, {a}).
  580:               t() -> X = 1, #r{a=foo, a=bar, a=qux}.
  581:              ">>,
  582:            [warn_unused_vars],
  583:            {error,[{{2,39},erl_lint,{redefine_field,r,a}},
  584:                    {{2,46},erl_lint,{redefine_field,r,a}}],
  585:                   [{{2,22},erl_lint,{unused_var,'X'}}]}}],
  586:     [] = run(Config, Ts),
  587:     ok.

  780:     Ts = [{exp1,

  871: %% Shadowed variables are tested in other places, but here we test
  872: %% that the warning can be turned off.
  873: shadow_vars(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  874:     Ts = [{shadow1,
  875: 	   <<"bin(A) ->
  876:                   receive
  877:                       M ->
  878:                            X = M,
  879:                            Y = M,
  880:                            Z = M
  881:                   end,
  882:                   [B || <<B:X>> <- A],
  883:                   Y = B,
  884:                   [B || B <- Z]. % B shadowed.
  885:            ">>,
  886: 	   [nowarn_shadow_vars],
  887: 	   {error,[{{9,23},erl_lint,{unbound_var,'B'}}],
  888: 	    [{{9,19},erl_lint,{exported_var,'Y',{'receive',{2,19}}}}]}},
  889:           {shadow2,
  890:            <<"t() ->
  891:                   _ = (catch MS = MS = 1), % MS used unsafe
  892:                   _ = case ok of _ -> fun() -> ok end end,
  893:                   fun (MS) -> MS end. % MS not shadowed here
  894:            ">>,
  895:            [],
  896:            []}],
  897:     [] = run(Config, Ts),
  898:     ok.
  899:

 1032: %% Test warnings for unused functions.
 1033: unused_function(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1034:     Ts = [{func1,
 1035: 	   <<"-export([t/1]).
 1036:               t(L) ->
 1037:                  lists:map(fun(X) -> 2*X end, L).
 1038: 
 1039:               fact(N) ->
 1040:                 fact_1(N, 1).
 1041: 
 1042:               fact_1(1, P) -> P;
 1043:               fact_1(N, P) -> fact_1(N-1, P*N).
 1044:            ">>,
 1045: 	   {[]},				%Tuple indicates no 'export_all'.
 1046: 	   {warnings,[{{5,15},erl_lint,{unused_function,{fact,1}}},
 1047: 		      {{8,15},erl_lint,{unused_function,{fact_1,2}}}]}},
 1048: 
 1049: 	  %% Turn off warnings for unused functions.
 1050: 	  {func2,
 1051: 	   <<"-export([t/1]).
 1052:               t(L) ->
 1053:                  lists:map(fun(X) -> 2*X end, L).
 1054: 
 1055:               b(X) ->
 1056:                 32*X.
 1057:            ">>,
 1058: 	   {[nowarn_unused_function]},         %Tuple indicates no 'export_all'.
 1059: 	   []},
 1060: 
 1061: 	  %% Turn off warnings for unused functions using a -compile() directive.
 1062: 	  {func3,
 1063: 	   <<"-export([t/1]).
 1064:               -compile(nowarn_unused_function).
 1065: 
 1066:               t(L) ->
 1067:                  lists:map(fun(X) -> 2*X end, L).
 1068: 
 1069:               b(X) ->
 1070:                 32*X.
 1071:            ">>,
 1072: 	   {[]},		     %Tuple indicates no 'export_all'.
 1073: 	   []}],
 1074: 
 1075:     [] = run(Config, Ts),
 1076:     ok.

 1078: %% Test warnings for unused types
 1079: unused_type(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1080:     Ts = [{func1,
 1081:            <<"-type foo() :: term().">>,
 1082:            {[]},                                %Tuple indicates no export_all
 1083:            {warnings,[{{1,22},erl_lint,{unused_type,{foo,0}}}]}},
 1084: 
 1085:            %% Turn off warnings for unused types.
 1086:            {func2,
 1087:            <<"-type foo() :: term().">>,
 1088:            {[nowarn_unused_type]},              %Tuple indicates no export_all
 1089:            []},
 1090: 
 1091:            %% Turn off warnings for unused types using a -compile() directive.
 1092:            {func3,
 1093:            <<"-compile(nowarn_unused_type).
 1094:               -type foo() :: term().">>,
 1095:            {[]},                                %Tuple indicates no export_all
 1096:            []}],
 1097: 
 1098:     [] = run(Config, Ts),
 1099:     ok.

 2381: %% OTP-15456. All compiler options can now be given in the option list
 2382: %% (as opposed to only in files).
 2383: otp_15456(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2384:     Ts = [
 2385:           %% {nowarn_deprecated_function,[{M,F,A}]} can now be given
 2386:           %% in the option list as well as in an attribute.
 2387:           %% Wherever it occurs, it is not affected by
 2388:           %% warn_deprecated_function.
 2389:           {otp_15456_1,
 2390:            <<"-compile({nowarn_deprecated_function,{erlang,now,0}}).
 2391:               -export([foo/0]).
 2392: 
 2393:               foo() ->
 2394:                   {erlang:now(), random:seed0(), random:seed(1, 2, 3),
 2395:                    random:uniform(), random:uniform(42)}.
 2396:            ">>,
 2397:            {[{nowarn_deprecated_function,{random,seed0,0}},
 2398:              {nowarn_deprecated_function,[{random,uniform,0},
 2399:                                           {random,uniform,1}]},
 2400:              %% There should be no warnings when attempting to
 2401:              %% turn of warnings for functions that are not
 2402:              %% deprecated or not used in the module.
 2403:              {nowarn_deprecated_function,{random,uniform_s,1}},
 2404:              {nowarn_deprecated_function,{erlang,abs,1}},
 2405:              warn_deprecated_function]},
 2406:            {warnings,[{{5,50},erl_lint,
 2407:                        {deprecated,{random,seed,3},
 2408:                         "use the 'rand' module instead"}}]}},
 2409: 
 2410:           %% {nowarn_unused_function,[{M,F,A}]} can be given
 2411:           %% in the option list as well as in an attribute.
 2412:           %% It was incorrectly documented to only work when
 2413:           %% given in an attribute.
 2414:           {otp_15456_2,
 2415:            <<"-compile({nowarn_unused_function,foo/0}).
 2416:               foo() -> ok.
 2417:               bar() -> ok.
 2418:               foobar() -> ok.
 2419:               barf(_) -> ok.
 2420:               other() -> ok.
 2421:            ">>,
 2422:            {[{nowarn_unused_function,[{bar,0},{foobar,0}]},
 2423:              {nowarn_unused_function,{barf,1}},
 2424:              %% There should be no warnings when attempting to
 2425:              %% turn of warnings for unused functions that are not
 2426:              %% defined in the module.
 2427:              {nowarn_unused_function,{not_defined_in_module,1}},
 2428:              warn_unused_function]},
 2429:            {warnings,[{{6,15},erl_lint,{unused_function,{other,0}}}]}
 2430:           }],
 2431: 
 2432:     [] = run(Config, Ts),
 2433:     ok.

 2644:

 2646:            <<"-record(r1, {a = begin A = 4, {A,B} end}). % B unbound
 2647:               -record(r2, {e = begin A = 3, #r1{} end}).
 2648:               t() -> #r2{}.
 2649:              ">>,
 2650:            [warn_unused_record],
 2651:            {error,[{{1,44},erl_lint,{variable_in_record_def,'A'}},
 2652:                    {{1,54},erl_lint,{unbound_var,'B'}},
 2653:                    {{2,38},erl_lint,{variable_in_record_def,'A'}}],
 2654:             [{{1,22},erl_lint,{unused_record,r1}}]}},
 2655:

 3061: %% Test warnings for functions that clash with BIFs.
 3062: bif_clash(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3063:     Ts = [{clash1,
 3064:            <<"t(X) ->
 3065:                   size(X).
 3066: 
 3067:               %% No warning for the following calls, since they
 3068:               %% are unambigous.
 3069:               b(X) ->
 3070:                   erlang:size(X).
 3071: 
 3072:               c(X) ->
 3073:                   ?MODULE:size(X).
 3074: 
 3075:               size({N,_}) ->
 3076:                 N.
 3077:              ">>,
 3078:            [],
 3079: 	   {errors,[{{2,19},erl_lint,{call_to_redefined_old_bif,{size,1}}}],[]}},
 3080: 
 3081: 	  %% Verify that warnings cannot be turned off in the old way.
 3082: 	  {clash2,
 3083:            <<"-export([t/1,size/1]).
 3084:               t(X) ->
 3085:                   size(X).
 3086: 
 3087:               size({N,_}) ->
 3088:                 N.
 3089: 
 3090:               %% My own abs/1 function works on lists too. From R14 this really works.
 3091:               abs([H|T]) when $a =< H, H =< $z -> [H-($a-$A)|abs(T)];
 3092:               abs([H|T]) -> [H|abs(T)];
 3093:               abs([]) -> [];
 3094:               abs(X) -> erlang:abs(X).
 3095:              ">>,
 3096: 	   {[nowarn_unused_function,nowarn_bif_clash]},
 3097: 	   {errors,[{erl_lint,disallowed_nowarn_bif_clash}],[]}},
 3098: 	  %% As long as noone calls an overridden BIF, it's totally OK
 3099: 	  {clash3,
 3100:            <<"-export([size/1]).
 3101:               size({N,_}) ->
 3102:                 N;
 3103:               size(X) ->
 3104:                 erlang:size(X).
 3105:              ">>,
 3106: 	   [],
 3107: 	   []},
 3108: 	  %% But this is totally wrong - meaning of the program changed in R14, so this is an error
 3109: 	  {clash4,
 3110:            <<"-export([size/1]).
 3111:               size({N,_}) ->
 3112:                 N;
 3113:               size(X) ->
 3114:                 size(X).
 3115:              ">>,
 3116: 	   [],
 3117: 	   {errors,[{{5,17},erl_lint,{call_to_redefined_old_bif,{size,1}}}],[]}},
 3118: 	  %% For a post R14 bif, its only a warning
 3119: 	  {clash5,
 3120:            <<"-export([binary_part/2]).
 3121:               binary_part({B,_},{X,Y}) ->
 3122:                 binary_part(B,{X,Y});
 3123:               binary_part(B,{X,Y}) ->
 3124:                 binary:part(B,X,Y).
 3125:              ">>,
 3126: 	   [],
 3127: 	   {warnings,[{{3,17},erl_lint,{call_to_redefined_bif,{binary_part,2}}}]}},
 3128: 	  %% If you really mean to call yourself here, you can "unimport" size/1
 3129: 	  {clash6,
 3130:            <<"-export([size/1]).
 3131:               -compile({no_auto_import,[size/1]}).
 3132:               size([]) ->
 3133:                 0;
 3134:               size({N,_}) ->
 3135:                 N;
 3136:               size([_|T]) ->
 3137:                 1+size(T).
 3138:              ">>,
 3139: 	   [],
 3140: 	   []},
 3141: 	  %% Same for the post R14 autoimport warning
 3142: 	  {clash7,
 3143:            <<"-export([binary_part/2]).
 3144:               -compile({no_auto_import,[binary_part/2]}).
 3145:               binary_part({B,_},{X,Y}) ->
 3146:                 binary_part(B,{X,Y});
 3147:               binary_part(B,{X,Y}) ->
 3148:                 binary:part(B,X,Y).
 3149:              ">>,
 3150: 	   [],
 3151: 	   []},
 3152:           %% but this doesn't mean the local function is allowed in a guard...
 3153: 	  {clash8,
 3154:            <<"-export([x/1]).
 3155:               -compile({no_auto_import,[binary_part/2]}).
 3156:               x(X) when binary_part(X,{1,2}) =:= <<1,2>> ->
 3157:                  hej.
 3158:               binary_part({B,_},{X,Y}) ->
 3159:                 binary_part(B,{X,Y});
 3160:               binary_part(B,{X,Y}) ->
 3161:                 binary:part(B,X,Y).
 3162:              ">>,
 3163: 	   [],
 3164: 	   {errors,[{{3,25},erl_lint,{illegal_guard_local_call,{binary_part,2}}}],[]}},
 3165:           %% no_auto_import is not like nowarn_bif_clash, it actually removes the autoimport
 3166: 	  {clash9,
 3167:            <<"-export([x/1]).
 3168:               -compile({no_auto_import,[binary_part/2]}).
 3169:               x(X) ->
 3170:                  binary_part(X,{1,2}) =:= <<1,2>>.
 3171:              ">>,
 3172: 	   [],
 3173: 	   {errors,[{{4,18},erl_lint,{undefined_function,{binary_part,2}}}],[]}},
 3174:           %% but we could import it again...
 3175: 	  {clash10,
 3176:            <<"-export([x/1]).
 3177:               -compile({no_auto_import,[binary_part/2]}).
 3178:               -import(erlang,[binary_part/2]).
 3179:               x(X) ->
 3180:                  binary_part(X,{1,2}) =:= <<1,2>>.
 3181:              ">>,
 3182: 	   [],
 3183: 	   []},
 3184:           %% and actually use it in a guard...
 3185: 	  {clash11,
 3186:            <<"-export([x/1]).
 3187:               -compile({no_auto_import,[binary_part/2]}).
 3188:               -import(erlang,[binary_part/2]).
 3189:               x(X) when binary_part(X,{0,1}) =:= <<0>> ->
 3190:                  binary_part(X,{1,2}) =:= <<1,2>>.
 3191:              ">>,
 3192: 	   [],
 3193: 	   []},
 3194:           %% but for non-obvious historical reasons, imported functions cannot be used in
 3195: 	  %% fun construction without the module name...
 3196: 	  {clash12,
 3197:            <<"-export([x/1]).
 3198:               -compile({no_auto_import,[binary_part/2]}).
 3199:               -import(erlang,[binary_part/2]).
 3200:               x(X) when binary_part(X,{0,1}) =:= <<0>> ->
 3201:                  binary_part(X,{1,2}) =:= fun binary_part/2.
 3202:              ">>,
 3203: 	   [],
 3204: 	   {errors,[{{5,43},erl_lint,{undefined_function,{binary_part,2}}}],[]}},
 3205:           %% Not from erlang and not from anywhere else
 3206: 	  {clash13,
 3207:            <<"-export([x/1]).
 3208:               -compile({no_auto_import,[binary_part/2]}).
 3209:               -import(x,[binary_part/2]).
 3210:               x(X) ->
 3211:                  binary_part(X,{1,2}) =:= fun binary_part/2.
 3212:              ">>,
 3213: 	   [],
 3214: 	   {errors,[{{5,43},erl_lint,{undefined_function,{binary_part,2}}}],[]}},
 3215: 	  %% ...while real auto-import is OK.
 3216: 	  {clash14,
 3217:            <<"-export([x/1]).
 3218:               x(X) when binary_part(X,{0,1}) =:= <<0>> ->
 3219:                  binary_part(X,{1,2}) =:= fun binary_part/2.
 3220:              ">>,
 3221: 	   [],
 3222: 	   []},
 3223:           %% Import directive clashing with old bif is an error, regardless of if it's called or not
 3224: 	  {clash15,
 3225:            <<"-export([x/1]).
 3226:               -import(x,[abs/1]).
 3227:               x(X) ->
 3228:                  binary_part(X,{1,2}).
 3229:              ">>,
 3230: 	   [],
 3231: 	   {errors,[{{2,16},erl_lint,{redefine_old_bif_import,{abs,1}}}],[]}},
 3232: 	  %% For a new BIF, it's only a warning
 3233: 	  {clash16,
 3234:            <<"-export([x/1]).
 3235:               -import(x,[binary_part/3]).
 3236:               x(X) ->
 3237:                  abs(X).
 3238:              ">>,
 3239: 	   [],
 3240: 	   {warnings,[{{2,16},erl_lint,{redefine_bif_import,{binary_part,3}}}]}},
 3241: 	  %% And, you cannot redefine already imported things that aren't auto-imported
 3242: 	  {clash17,
 3243:            <<"-export([x/1]).
 3244:               -import(x,[binary_port/3]).
 3245:               -import(y,[binary_port/3]).
 3246:               x(X) ->
 3247:                  abs(X).
 3248:              ">>,
 3249: 	   [],
 3250: 	   {errors,[{{3,16},erl_lint,{redefine_import,{{binary_port,3},x}}}],[]}},
 3251: 	  %% Not with local functions either
 3252: 	  {clash18,
 3253:            <<"-export([x/1]).
 3254:               -import(x,[binary_port/3]).
 3255:               binary_port(A,B,C) ->
 3256:                  binary_part(A,B,C).
 3257:               x(X) ->
 3258:                  abs(X).
 3259:              ">>,
 3260: 	   [],
 3261: 	   {errors,[{{3,15},erl_lint,{define_import,{binary_port,3}}}],[]}},
 3262: 	  %% Like clash8: Dont accept a guard if it's explicitly module-name called either
 3263: 	  {clash19,
 3264:            <<"-export([binary_port/3]).
 3265:               -compile({no_auto_import,[binary_part/3]}).
 3266:               -import(x,[binary_part/3]).
 3267:               binary_port(A,B,C) when x:binary_part(A,B,C) ->
 3268:                  binary_part(A,B,C+1).
 3269:              ">>,
 3270: 	   [],
 3271: 	   {errors,[{{4,39},erl_lint,illegal_guard_expr}],[]}},
 3272: 	  %% Not with local functions either
 3273: 	  {clash20,
 3274:            <<"-export([binary_port/3]).
 3275:               -import(x,[binary_part/3]).
 3276:               binary_port(A,B,C) ->
 3277:                  binary_part(A,B,C).
 3278:              ">>,
 3279: 	   [warn_unused_import],
 3280: 	   {warnings,[{{2,16},erl_lint,{redefine_bif_import,{binary_part,3}}}]}},
 3281: 	  %% Don't accept call to a guard BIF if there is a local definition
 3282: 	  %% or an import with the same name. Note: is_record/2 is an
 3283: 	  %% exception, since it is more of syntatic sugar than a real BIF.
 3284: 	  {clash21,
 3285:            <<"-export([is_list/1]).
 3286:               -import(x, [is_tuple/1]).
 3287:               -record(r, {a,b}).
 3288:               x(T) when is_tuple(T) -> ok;
 3289:               x(T) when is_list(T) -> ok.
 3290:               y(T) when is_tuple(T) =:= true -> ok;
 3291:               y(T) when is_list(T) =:= true -> ok;
 3292:               y(T) when is_record(T, r, 3) -> ok;
 3293:               y(T) when is_record(T, r, 3) =:= true -> ok;
 3294:               y(T) when is_record(T, r) =:= true -> ok.
 3295:               is_list(_) ->
 3296:                 ok.
 3297:               is_record(_, _) ->
 3298:                 ok.
 3299:               is_record(_, _, _) ->
 3300:                 ok.
 3301:              ">>,
 3302: 	   [{no_auto_import,[{is_tuple,1}]}],
 3303: 	   {errors,[{{4,25},erl_lint,{illegal_guard_local_call,{is_tuple,1}}},
 3304: 		    {{5,25},erl_lint,{illegal_guard_local_call,{is_list,1}}},
 3305: 		    {{6,25},erl_lint,{illegal_guard_local_call,{is_tuple,1}}},
 3306: 		    {{7,25},erl_lint,{illegal_guard_local_call,{is_list,1}}},
 3307: 		    {{8,25},erl_lint,{illegal_guard_local_call,{is_record,3}}},
 3308: 		    {{9,25},erl_lint,{illegal_guard_local_call,{is_record,3}}}],[]}},
 3309: 	  %% We can also suppress all auto imports at once
 3310: 	  {clash22,
 3311:           <<"-export([size/1, binary_part/2]).
 3312:              -compile(no_auto_import).
 3313:              size([]) ->
 3314:                0;
 3315:              size({N,_}) ->
 3316:                N;
 3317:              size([_|T]) ->
 3318:                1+size(T).
 3319:              binary_part({B,_},{X,Y}) ->
 3320:                binary_part(B,{X,Y});
 3321:              binary_part(B,{X,Y}) ->
 3322:                binary:part(B,X,Y).
 3323:             ">>,
 3324: 	   [],
 3325: 	   []}
 3326: 	 ],
 3327: 
 3328:     [] = run(Config, Ts),
 3329:     ok.
 3330:

 3463: %% OTP-11861. behaviour_info() and -callback.
 3464: otp_11861(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 3465:     CallbackFiles = [callback1, callback2, callback3,
 3466:                      bad_behaviour1, bad_behaviour2],
 3467:     lists:foreach(fun(M) ->
 3468:                           F = filename:join(?datadir, M),
 3469:                           Opts = [{outdir,?privdir}, return],
 3470:                           {ok, M, []} = compile:file(F, Opts)
 3471:                   end, CallbackFiles),
 3472:     CodePath = code:get_path(),
 3473:     true = code:add_path(?privdir),
 3474:     Ts = [{otp_11861_1,
 3475:            <<"
 3476:               -export([b1/1]).
 3477:               -behaviour(callback1).
 3478:               -behaviour(callback2).
 3479: 
 3480:               -spec b1(atom()) -> integer().
 3481:               b1(A) when is_atom(A)->
 3482:                   3.
 3483:              ">>,
 3484:            [],
 3485:            %% b2/1 is optional in both modules
 3486:            {warnings,[{{4,16},erl_lint,
 3487:                        {conflicting_behaviours,{b1,1},callback2,{3,16},callback1}}]}},
 3488:           {otp_11861_2,
 3489:            <<"
 3490:               -export([b2/1]).
 3491:               -behaviour(callback1).
 3492:               -behaviour(callback2).
 3493: 
 3494:               -spec b2(integer()) -> atom().
 3495:               b2(I) when is_integer(I)->
 3496:                   a.
 3497:              ">>,
 3498:            [],
 3499:            %% b2/1 is optional in callback2, but not in callback1
 3500:            {warnings,[{{3,16},erl_lint,{undefined_behaviour_func,{b1,1},callback1}},
 3501:                       {{4,16},erl_lint,
 3502:                        {conflicting_behaviours,{b2,1},callback2,{3,16},callback1}}]}},
 3503:           {otp_11861_3,
 3504:            <<"
 3505:               -callback b(_) -> atom().
 3506:               -optional_callbacks({b1,1}). % non-existing and ignored
 3507:              ">>,
 3508:            [],
 3509:            []},

 3513:               -optional_callbacks([{b1,1}]). % non-existing
 3514:              ">>,
 3515:            [],

 3520:               -optional_callbacks([{b1,1}]). % non-existing
 3521:              ">>,
 3522:            [],
 3523:            %% No behaviour-info() and no callback: warning anyway
 3524:            {errors,[{{2,16},erl_lint,{undefined_callback,{lint_test,b1,1}}}],[]}},
 3525:           {otp_11861_6,
 3526:            <<"

 3528:               behaviour_info(callbacks) -> [{b1,1}].

 3530:            [],
 3531:            %% behaviour-info() and no callback: warning anyway

 3537:               behaviour_info(callbacks) -> [{b1,1}].
 3538:              ">>,
 3539:            [],

 3543:             []}},

 3648: %% Test that the new utf8/utf16/utf32 types do not allow size or
 3649: %% unit specifiers.
 3650: otp_7550(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3651:     Ts = [{otp_7550,
 3652:            <<"f8(A) ->
 3653:                   <<A:8/utf8>>.
 3654:               g8(A) ->
 3655:                   <<A:8/utf8-unit:1>>.
 3656:               h8(A) ->
 3657:                   <<A/utf8-unit:1>>.
 3658: 
 3659:               f16(A) ->
 3660:                   <<A:8/utf16>>.
 3661:               g16(A) ->
 3662:                   <<A:8/utf16-unit:1>>.
 3663:               h16(A) ->
 3664:                   <<A/utf16-unit:1>>.
 3665: 
 3666:               f32(A) ->
 3667:                   <<A:8/utf32>>.
 3668:               g32(A) ->
 3669:                   <<A:8/utf32-unit:1>>.
 3670:               h32(A) ->
 3671:                   <<A/utf32-unit:1>>.
 3672:              ">>,
 3673:            [],
 3674:            {errors,[{{2,21},erl_lint,utf_bittype_size_or_unit},
 3675: 		    {{4,21},erl_lint,utf_bittype_size_or_unit},
 3676: 		    {{6,21},erl_lint,utf_bittype_size_or_unit},
 3677: 		    {{9,21},erl_lint,utf_bittype_size_or_unit},
 3678: 		    {{11,21},erl_lint,utf_bittype_size_or_unit},
 3679: 		    {{13,21},erl_lint,utf_bittype_size_or_unit},
 3680: 		    {{16,21},erl_lint,utf_bittype_size_or_unit},
 3681: 		    {{18,21},erl_lint,utf_bittype_size_or_unit},

 3689: %% Bugfix: -opaque with invalid type.
 3690: otp_8051(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3691:     Ts = [{otp_8051,
 3692:            <<"-opaque foo() :: bar().
 3693:               -export_type([foo/0]).
 3694:              ">>,

 3699: 
 3700: %% Check that format warnings are generated.
 3701: format_warn(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3702:     L1 = 16,
 3703:     L2 = 5,
 3704:     format_level(1, L1, Config),
 3705:     format_level(2, L1+L2, Config),
 3706:     format_level(3, L1+L2, Config),             %there is no level 3
 3707:     ok.
 3708: 
 3709: format_level(Level, Count, Config) ->
 3710:     W = get_compilation_result(Config, "format",
 3711:                                      [{warn_format, Level}]),
 3712:     %% Pick out the 'format' warnings.
 3713:     FW = lists:filter(fun({_Line, erl_lint, {format_error, _}}) -> true;
 3714:                                (_) -> false
 3715:                             end,
 3716:                             W),
 3717:     case length(FW) of
 3718:               Count ->
 3719:                   ok;
 3720:               Other ->
 3721:                   io:format("Expected ~w warning(s); got ~w", [Count,Other]),
 3722:                   fail()
 3723:           end,
 3724:     ok.

 4216: %% OTP-11879: The -spec f/a :: (As) -> B; syntax removed,
 4217: %% and is_subtype/2 deprecated.
 4218: otp_11879(_Config) ->
 4219:     Fs = [{attribute,0,file,{"file.erl",0}},
 4220:           {attribute,0,module,m},
 4221:           {attribute,1,spec,
 4222:            {{f,1},
 4223:             [{type,2,'fun',[{type,3,product,[{var,4,'V1'},
 4224:                                              {var,5,'V1'}]},
 4225:                             {type,6,integer,[]}]}]}},
 4226:           {attribute,20,callback,
 4227:            {{cb,21},
 4228:             [{type,22,'fun',[{type,23,product,[{var,24,'V1'},
 4229:                                                {var,25,'V1'}]},
 4230:                              {type,6,integer,[]}]}]}}],
 4231:     {error,[{"file.erl",
 4232:              [{1,erl_lint,{spec_fun_undefined,{f,1}}},
 4233:               {2,erl_lint,spec_wrong_arity},
 4234:               {22,erl_lint,callback_wrong_arity}]}],
 4235:      []} = compile_forms(Fs, [return,report]),
 4236:     ok.
 4237: 
 4238: compile_forms(Terms, Opts) ->
 4239:     Forms = [erl_parse:anno_from_term(Term) || Term <- Terms],
 4240:     compile:forms(Forms, Opts).
 4241:

 4246:              {{1,2},erl_lint,{bad_deprecated,{frutt,0}}}],
 4247:      []} = run_test2(Config, Abstr, []),
 4248:     ok.

 4257:            {errors,[{{2,36},erl_lint,{redefine_field,r,a}},
 4258: 		    {{3,35},erl_lint,{redefine_field,r,a}}],[]}}],
 4259:     run(Config, Ts).
 4260: 
 4261: otp_11879_cont(Config) ->
 4262:     Ts = [{constraint1,
 4263:            <<"-export([t/1]).
 4264:               -spec t(X) -> X when is_subtype(integer()).
 4265:               t(a) -> foo:bar().
 4266:              ">>,
 4267:            [],

 4270:             []}},

 4272:            <<"-export([t/1]).
 4273:               -spec t(X) -> X when bad_atom(X, integer()).
 4274:               t(a) -> foo:bar().
 4275:              ">>,
 4276:            [],

 4279:             []}},

 4283:               t(a) -> foo:bar().

 4297:               t(a) -> foo:bar().

 4309: 
 4310: %% OTP-14285: We currently don't support non-latin1 module names.
 4311: 
 4312: non_latin1_module(Config) ->
 4313:     Expected = [non_latin1_module_unsupported],
 4314:     Expected = check_module_name('юникод'),
 4315:     Expected = check_module_name(list_to_atom([256,$a,$b,$c])),
 4316:     Expected = check_module_name(list_to_atom([$a,$b,256,$c])),
 4317: 
 4318:     "module names with non-latin1 characters are not supported" =
 4319:         format_error(non_latin1_module_unsupported),
 4320:     BadCallback =
 4321:         {bad_callback,{'кирилли́ческий атом','кирилли́ческий атом',0}},
 4322:     BadModule =
 4323:         {bad_module,{'кирилли́ческий атом','кирилли́ческий атом',0}},
 4324:     "explicit module not allowed for callback "
 4325:     "'кирилли́ческий атом':'кирилли́ческий атом'/0" =
 4326:         format_error(BadCallback),
 4327:     UndefBehav = {undefined_behaviour,'кирилли́ческий атом'},
 4328:     "behaviour 'кирилли́ческий атом' undefined" =
 4329:         format_error(UndefBehav),
 4330:     Ts = [{non_latin1_module,
 4331:            <<"
 4332:             %% Report uses of module names with non-Latin-1 characters.
 4333: 
 4334:             -import('кирилли́ческий атом', []).
 4335:             -behaviour('кирилли́ческий атом').
 4336:             -behavior('кирилли́ческий атом').
 4337: 
 4338:             -callback 'кирилли́ческий атом':'кирилли́ческий атом'() -> a.
 4339: 
 4340:             %% erl_lint:gexpr/3 is not extended to check module name here:
 4341:             t1() when 'кирилли́ческий атом':'кирилли́ческий атом'(1) ->
 4342:                 b.
 4343: 
 4344:             t2() ->
 4345:                 'кирилли́ческий атом':'кирилли́ческий атом'().
 4346: 
 4347:             -spec 'кирилли́ческий атом':'кирилли́ческий атом'() -> atom().
 4348: 
 4349:             -spec 'кирилли́ческий атом'(integer()) ->
 4350:               'кирилли́ческий атом':'кирилли́ческий атом'().
 4351: 
 4352:             'кирилли́ческий атом'(1) ->
 4353:                 'кирилли́ческий атом':f(),
 4354:                 F = f,
 4355:                 'кирилли́ческий атом':F()."/utf8>>,
 4356:            [],
 4357:            {error,
 4358:             [{{4,14},erl_lint,non_latin1_module_unsupported},
 4359:              {{5,14},erl_lint,non_latin1_module_unsupported},
 4360:              {{6,14},erl_lint,non_latin1_module_unsupported},
 4361:              {{8,14},erl_lint,non_latin1_module_unsupported},
 4362:              {{8,14},erl_lint,BadCallback},
 4363:              {{11,23},erl_lint,illegal_guard_expr},
 4364:              {{15,17},erl_lint,non_latin1_module_unsupported},
 4365:              {{17,14},erl_lint,non_latin1_module_unsupported},
 4366:              {{17,14},erl_lint,BadModule},
 4367:              {{20,15},erl_lint,non_latin1_module_unsupported},
 4368:              {{23,17},erl_lint,non_latin1_module_unsupported},
 4369:              {{25,17},erl_lint,non_latin1_module_unsupported}],
 4370:             [{{5,14},erl_lint,UndefBehav},
 4371:              {{6,14},erl_lint,UndefBehav}]}}],
 4372:     run(Config, Ts),
 4373:     ok.
 4374: 
 4375: illegal_module_name(_Config) ->
 4376:     [empty_module_name] = check_module_name(''),
 4377: 
 4378:     [ctrl_chars_in_module_name] = check_module_name('\x00'),
 4379:     [ctrl_chars_in_module_name] = check_module_name('abc\x1F'),
 4380:     [ctrl_chars_in_module_name] = check_module_name('\x7F'),
 4381:     [ctrl_chars_in_module_name] = check_module_name('abc\x80'),
 4382:     [ctrl_chars_in_module_name] = check_module_name('abc\x80xyz'),
 4383:     [ctrl_chars_in_module_name] = check_module_name('\x9Fxyz'),
 4384: 
 4385:     [ctrl_chars_in_module_name,
 4386:      non_latin1_module_unsupported] = check_module_name('атом\x00'),
 4387: 
 4388:     [blank_module_name] = check_module_name(' '),
 4389:     [blank_module_name] = check_module_name('\xA0'),
 4390:     [blank_module_name] = check_module_name('\xAD'),
 4391:     [blank_module_name] = check_module_name('  \xA0\xAD '),
 4392: 
 4393:     %% White space and soft hyphens are OK if there are visible
 4394:     %% characters in the name.
 4395:     ok = check_module_name(' abc '),
 4396:     ok = check_module_name('abc '),
 4397:     ok = check_module_name(' abc '),
 4398:     ok = check_module_name(' abc xyz '),
 4399:     ok = check_module_name(' abc\xADxyz '),
 4400: 
 4401:     ok.
 4402: 
 4403: check_module_name(Mod) ->
 4404:     File = atom_to_list(Mod) ++ ".erl",
 4405:     L1 = erl_anno:new(1),
 4406:     Forms = [{attribute,L1,file,{File,1}},
 4407:              {attribute,L1,module,Mod},
 4408:              {eof,2}],
 4409:     _ = compile:forms(Forms),
 4410:     case compile:forms(Forms, [return]) of
 4411:         {error,Errors,[]} ->
 4412:             [{_ModName,L}] = Errors,
 4413:             lists:sort([Reason || {1,erl_lint,Reason} <- L]);
 4414:         {ok,Mod,Code,Ws} when is_binary(Code), is_list(Ws)  ->
 4415:             ok
 4416:     end.
 4417: 
 4418: otp_14378(Config) ->
 4419:     Ts = [
 4420:           {otp_14378_1,
 4421:            <<"-export([t/0]).
 4422:               -compile({nowarn_deprecated_function,{erlang,now,1}}).
 4423:               t() ->
 4424:                  erlang:now().">>,
 4425:            [],
 4426:            {warnings,[{{4,18},erl_lint,
 4427:                        {deprecated,{erlang,now,0},
 4428:                         "see the \"Time and Time Correction in Erlang\" "
 4429:                         "chapter of the ERTS User's Guide for more "
 4430:                         "information"}}]}}],
 4431:     [] = run(Config, Ts),
 4432:     ok.

 4482: stacktrace_syntax(Config) ->
 4483:     Ts = [{guard,
 4484:            <<"t1() ->
 4485:                   try error(foo)
 4486:                   catch _:_:Stk when is_number(Stk) -> ok
 4487:                   end.
 4488:            ">>,
 4489:            [],
 4490:            {errors,[{{3,48},erl_lint,{stacktrace_guard,'Stk'}}],[]}},
 4491:           {bound,
 4492:            <<"t1() ->
 4493:                   Stk = [],
 4494:                   try error(foo)
 4495:                   catch _:_:Stk -> ok
 4496:                   end.
 4497:            ">>,
 4498:            [],
 4499:            {errors,[{{4,29},erl_lint,{stacktrace_bound,'Stk'}}],[]}},
 4500:           {bound_in_pattern,
 4501:            <<"t1() ->
 4502:                   try error(foo)
 4503:                   catch _:{x,T}:T -> ok
 4504:                   end.
 4505:            ">>,
 4506:            [],
 4507:            {errors,[{{3,33},erl_lint,{stacktrace_bound,'T'}}],[]}},
 4508:           {guard_and_bound,
 4509:            <<"t1() ->
 4510:                   Stk = [],
 4511:                   try error(foo)
 4512:                   catch _:_:Stk when is_integer(Stk) -> ok
 4513:                   end.
 4514:            ">>,
 4515:            [],
 4516:            {errors,[{{4,29},erl_lint,{stacktrace_bound,'Stk'}},
 4517:                     {{4,49},erl_lint,{stacktrace_guard,'Stk'}}],[]}}
 4518:          ],
 4519: 
 4520:     run(Config, Ts),
 4521:     ok.

 4604:              -removed([{t,'_'}]).   %% not okay since t/0 is exported

 4626: 
 4627: one_multi_init(Config) ->
 4628:     "'_' initializes no omitted fields" =
 4629:         format_error(bad_multi_field_init),
 4630:     Ts = [{otp_16516_1,
 4631:            <<"-record(r, {f}).
 4632:               t(#r{f = 17, _ = V}) ->
 4633:                   V.
 4634:               u(#r{_ = V, f = 17}) ->
 4635:                   V.
 4636:               -record(r1, {f, g = 17}).
 4637:               g(#r1{f = 3, _ = 42}) ->
 4638:                 g.
 4639:              ">>,
 4640:            [],
 4641:            {errors,[{{2,28},erl_lint,bad_multi_field_init},
 4642:                     {{4,20},erl_lint,bad_multi_field_init}],[]}},
 4643:           {otp_16516_2,
 4644:            %% No error since "_ = '_'" is actually used as a catch-all
 4645:            %% initialization. V is unused (as compilation with the 'E'
 4646:            %% option shows), but no warning about V being unused is
 4647:            %% output.
 4648:            <<"-record(r, {f}).
 4649:               t(V) ->
 4650:                   #r{f = 3, _ = V}.
 4651:               u(V) ->
 4652:                   #r{_ = V, f = 3}.
 4653:              ">>,
 4654:            [],
 4655:            []},
 4656:           {otp_16516_3,
 4657:            %% No error in this case either. And no unused variable warning.
 4658:            <<"-record(r, {f}).
 4659:               t(V) when #r{f = 3, _ = V} =:= #r{f = 3} ->
 4660:                   a.
 4661:               u(V) when #r{_ = V, f = 3} =:= #r{f = 3} ->
 4662:                   a.
 4663:              ">>,
 4664:            [],
 4665:            []}],
 4666:     [] = run(Config, Ts).
 4667: 
 4668: several_multi_inits(Config) ->

 4671:               t(#r{f = 17, _ = V1,
 4672:                            _ = V2}) ->
 4673:                   {V1, V2}.
 4674:               u(#r{_ = V1, f = 17,
 4675:                    _ = V2}) ->
 4676:                   {V1, V2}.
 4677:               v(#r{_ = V1, f = 17}) ->
 4678:                   V1.
 4679:              ">>,
 4680:            [],
 4681:            {errors,[{{3,28},erl_lint,bad_multi_field_init},
 4682:                     {{4,20},erl_lint,{unbound_var,'V1'}},
 4683:                     {{4,24},erl_lint,{unbound_var,'V2'}},
 4684:                     {{6,20},erl_lint,bad_multi_field_init},

 4693:                   #r{_ = V1,
 4694:                      _ = V2, f = 3}.
 4695:              ">>,
 4696:            [],

 4705:                   a.

 4762: warn_missing_spec(Config) ->
 4763:     Test = <<"-export([external_with_spec/0, external_no_spec/0]).
 4764: 
 4765:               -spec external_with_spec() -> ok.

 4767:

 4769: 
 4770:               -spec internal_with_spec() -> ok.
 4771:               internal_with_spec() -> ok.
 4772: 
 4773:               internal_no_spec() -> ok.">>,
 4774: 
 4775:     %% Be sure to avoid adding export_all using the option-list-in-a-tuple trick.
 4776:     {warnings, [{{6,15}, erl_lint, {missing_spec, {external_no_spec, 0}}}]} =
 4777:         run_test(Config, Test, {[warn_missing_spec, nowarn_unused_function]}),

 4842:                                         {_T,_T} = _T1   %% Match: warning.

 5203:            <<"t(A) when A =:= 0.0 -> ok;\n" %% Should warn.
 5204:              "t(A) when A =:= {0.0} -> ok.\n" %% Should warn.
 5205:              "k(A) -> A =:= 0.0.\n" %% Should warn.
 5206:              "q(A) -> A =:= {0.0}.\n" %% Should warn.
 5207:              "z(A) when A =:= +0.0 -> ok;\n" %% Should not warn.
 5208:              "z(A) when A =:= {+0.0} -> ok.\n">>, %% Should not warn.
 5209:            [],

 5218: 
 5219: %% GH-7655. When the module definition was missing, spurious
 5220: %% diagnostics would be emitted for each spec.
 5221: undefined_module(Config) ->
 5222:     Code = <<"-spec foo() -> 'ok'.
 5223:               foo() -> ok.
 5224:              ">>,
 5225:     {errors,[{{1,2},erl_lint,undefined_module}],[]} = run_test2(Config, Code, []),
 5226:

 5228: 
 5229: %%%
 5230: %%% Common utilities.
 5231: %%%
 5232: 
 5233: format_error(E) ->
 5234:     lists:flatten(erl_lint:format_error(E)).
 5235: 
 5236: run(Config, Tests) ->
 5237:     F = fun({N,P,Ws,E}, BadL) ->
 5238:                 io:format("### ~s\n", [N]),
 5239:                 case catch run_test(Config, P, Ws) of
 5240:                     E -> 
 5241:                         BadL;
 5242:                     Bad -> 
 5243:                         io:format("~nTest ~p failed. Expected~n  ~p~n"
 5244:                                   "but got~n  ~p~n", [N, E, Bad]),
 5245: 			fail()
 5246:                 end
 5247:         end,
 5248:     lists:foldl(F, [], Tests).
 5249: 
 5250: %% Compiles a test file and returns the list of warnings/errors.
 5251: 
 5252: get_compilation_result(Conf, Filename, Warnings) ->
 5253:     DataDir = ?datadir,
 5254:     File = filename:join(DataDir, Filename),
 5255:     {ok,Bin} = file:read_file(File++".erl"),
 5256:     FileS = binary_to_list(Bin),
 5257:     {match,[{Start,Length}|_]} = re:run(FileS, "-module.*\\n"),
 5258:     Test = lists:nthtail(Start+Length, FileS),
 5259:     case run_test(Conf, Test, Warnings) of
 5260:         {warnings, Ws} -> Ws;
 5261:         {errors,Es,Ws} -> {Es,Ws};
 5262:         [] -> []
 5263:     end.
 5264: 
 5265: %% Compiles a test module and returns the list of errors and warnings.
 5266: 
 5267: run_test(Conf, Test0, Warnings0) ->
 5268:     Test = list_to_binary(["-module(lint_test). ", Test0]),
 5269:     run_test2(Conf, Test, Warnings0).
 5270: 
 5271: run_test2(Conf, Test, Warnings0) ->
 5272:     Filename = "lint_test.erl",
 5273:     DataDir = ?privdir,
 5274:     File = filename:join(DataDir, Filename),
 5275:     Opts = case Warnings0 of
 5276:                {Warnings} ->		%Hairy trick to not add export_all.
 5277:                    [return|Warnings];
 5278:                Warnings ->
 5279:                    [export_all,return|Warnings]
 5280:            end,
 5281:     ok = file:write_file(File, Test),
 5282: 
 5283:     %% We will use the 'binary' option so that the compiler will not
 5284:     %% compare the module name to the output file name. Also, there
 5285:     %% is no reason to produce an output file since we are only
 5286:     %% interested in the errors and warnings.
 5287: 
 5288:     %% Print warnings, call erl_lint:format_error/1. (But note that
 5289:     %% the compiler will ignore failing calls to erl_lint:format_error/1.)
 5290:     compile:file(File, [binary,report|Opts]),
 5291: 
 5292:     case compile:file(File, [binary|Opts]) of
 5293:         {ok, _M, Code, Ws} when is_binary(Code) ->
 5294:             warnings(File, Ws, Test);
 5295:         {error, [{File,Es}], []} ->
 5296:             print_diagnostics(Es, Test),
 5297: 	    {errors, call_format_error(Es), []};
 5298:         {error, [{File,Es}], [{File,Ws}]} ->
 5299:             print_diagnostics(Es, Test),
 5300:             print_diagnostics(Ws, Test),
 5301: 	    {error, call_format_error(Es), call_format_error(Ws)};
 5302:         {error, [{File,Es1},{File,Es2}], []} ->
 5303:             print_diagnostics(Es1, Test),
 5304:             print_diagnostics(Es2, Test),
 5305: 	    {errors2, Es1, Es2}
 5306:     end.
 5307: 
 5308: warnings(File, Ws, Source) ->
 5309:     case lists:append([W || {F, W} <- Ws, F =:= File]) of
 5310:         [] ->
 5311: 	    [];
 5312:         L ->
 5313:             print_diagnostics(L, Source),
 5314: 	    {warnings, call_format_error(L)}
 5315:     end.
 5316: 
 5317: call_format_error(L) ->
 5318:     %% Smoke test of format_error/1 to make sure that no crashes
 5319:     %% slip through.
 5320:     _ = [Mod:format_error(Term) || {_,Mod,Term} <- L],
 5321:     L.
 5322: 
 5323: print_diagnostics(Warnings, Source) ->
 5324:     case binary:match(Source, <<"-file(">>) of
 5325:         nomatch ->
 5326:             Lines = binary:split(Source, <<"\n">>, [global]),
 5327:             Cs = [print_diagnostic(W, Lines) || W <- Warnings],
 5328:             io:put_chars(Cs);
 5329:         _ ->
 5330:             %% There are probably fake line numbers greater than
 5331:             %% the number of actual lines.
 5332:             ok
 5333:     end.
 5334: 
 5335: print_diagnostic({{LineNum,Column},Mod,Data}, Lines) ->
 5336:     Line0 = lists:nth(LineNum, Lines),
 5337:     <<Line1:(Column-1)/binary,_/binary>> = Line0,
 5338:     Spaces = re:replace(Line1, <<"[^\t]">>, <<" ">>, [global]),
 5339:     CaretLine = [Spaces,"^"],
 5340:     [io_lib:format("~p:~p: ~ts\n", [LineNum,Column,Mod:format_error(Data)]),
 5341:      Line0, "\n",
 5342:      CaretLine, "\n\n"];
 5343: print_diagnostic(_, _) ->
 5344:     [].
 5345: 
 5346: fail() ->
 5347:     ct:fail(failed).
